content.question: What is the rotational inertia of Disk <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2</mn> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="one fourth times, I sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="one half times, I sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="three fourths times, I sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="three halves times, I sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="three halves times, I sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
